amendment.description: Amendment sought to add findings stating that Simpson-Bowles created a balanced package of revenue and spending reforms which should form the basis for meeting the requirements of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-8 to add findings stating Simpson-Bowles created a balanced package of revenue and spending reforms which should form the basis for meeting the requirements of this act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 348 (Roll no. 36).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schrader.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 348 (Roll no. 36).
